Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track condition near Western (Forest Park branch). Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track condition near Western (Forest Park branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
